page.title: 11BUILDING
page.content: The planners have placed limits around Campden and Broad Campden outside which building may not take place. This has placed very heavy pressure on the available land within the limits. The High St.houses had gardens which stretched to Back Ends, now for the most part built on and that within the last ten years. The Parish Council fear that further development in this area will spoil the country lane aspect. The new housing is being built for the most part by speculative builders who do not follow the rules evolved over generations therefore the houses look out of place,the materials used are unsympathetic, and in order to take a profit there are two many houses crammed into too small a space. The local people are concerned ,they feel that the unique atmosphere of Campden is being destroyed .
